description: Try our easy to follow Sushi Burrito Bento Box recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sushi,Pescatarian,Fish,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Rice,Healthier Easier,Aug 2020,Back to school,Spinach
name: Sushi Burrito Bento Box Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 10 no added salt brown rice crackers

recipeInstructions.text: Lay 1 nori sheet on a large piece of plastic wrap. Wet 1 long edge and top with another sheet, overlapping slightly. Press lightly to stick.

In centre of nori sheet, place half each of the rice, mayonnaise, spinach, cabbage, avocado and tuna. Roll and fold, then wrap in plastic wrap to tighten. Slice in half. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Place in bento box along with snacks.
